section.title: Enabling and Changing a Quota Mode in a Data Center
section.para: This procedure enables or changes the quota mode in a data center. You must select a quota mode before you can define quotas. You must be logged in to the Administration Portal to follow the steps of this procedure.
Use Audit mode to test your quota to make sure it works as you expect it to. You do not need to have your quota in Audit mode to create or change a quota.

procedure.title: Enabling and Changing Quota in a Data Center

step.para: Click the Data Centers tab in the Navigation Pane.
From the list of data centers displayed in the Navigation Pane, choose the data center whose quota policy you plan to edit.
Click Edit in the top left of the Navigation Pane.
An Edit Data Center window opens.
In the Quota Mode drop-down, change the quota mode to Enforced.

section.para: You have now enabled a quota mode at the Data Center level. If you set the quota mode to Audit during testing, then you must change it to Enforced in order for the quota settings to take effect.
